packInfo.name: warbler-pack-faction-politics
packInfo.description: Specialized templates for political intrigue, faction diplomacy, and court machinations
packInfo.author: TWG Team

templates.title: Political Threat Warning
templates.description: A veiled warning about political consequences or faction displeasure
templates.content: {{user_name}}, I would tread carefully if I were you. The {{faction_name}} has long memories, and {{faction_leader}} does not forget those who cross {{faction_pronoun}}. Your recent actions in {{location}} have not gone unnoticed.

templates.title: Information Trading
templates.description: Offering to trade political information or secrets
templates.content: Information is the most valuable currency in {{location}}, {{user_name}}. I know things about {{target_faction}} that could prove... useful to someone in your position. But such knowledge comes at a price. What do you offer in return?

templates.title: Alliance Proposal
templates.description: Diplomatic overture suggesting political alliance or cooperation
templates.content: The times ahead will test us all, {{user_title}}. {{our_faction}} and your people share common interests against {{threat_description}}. Perhaps it is time we discussed a more... formal arrangement between our houses?

templates.title: Betrayal Revelation
templates.description: Revealing a political betrayal or double-cross
templates.content: You seem surprised, {{user_name}}. Did you truly believe {{betrayer_name}} was loyal to your cause? {{betrayer_pronoun}} has been feeding information to {{rival_faction}} for months. The raid on {{location}} was no coincidence.

templates.title: Loyalty Test
templates.description: Testing political allegiance or commitment to a faction
templates.content: Your words speak of loyalty to {{faction_name}}, but words are cheap in the halls of power. {{faction_leader}} requires proof of your commitment. There is a task that needs... discrete handling. Are you prepared to serve?

templates.title: Diplomatic Immunity Claim
templates.description: Claiming diplomatic protection or political immunity
templates.content: Hold your accusations, {{user_title}}! I am {{diplomatic_title}} {{npc_name}}, official representative of {{faction_name}}. Any action against me would be considered an act of aggression against my people. I trust you understand the implications?
